cause.description:
CRS is the official overseas relief and development organization of the United States Catholic Church. They work in more than 100 countries around the world delivering aid during disasters and promoting long term development programs around education, employment, agriculture, human rights, health, and peacebuilding.
1. Live the gospels by helping the poor
2. Regardless of religious belief people need to be helped
cause.mission: Help the most vulnerable overseas through direct aid and development
cause.name: Catholic Relief Services
